Class SpecialCargoHold

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.it.galaxytrucker.model.componenttiles.ComponentTile
it.polimi.it.galaxytrucker.model.componenttiles.CargoHold
it.polimi.it.galaxytrucker.model.componenttiles.SpecialCargoHold
public class SpecialCargoHold extends CargoHold
This class represents a Special Cargo Hold component tile. Special Cargo Holds can store containers of goods including special cargo.
Version:
1.1
Author:
Giacomo Amaducci

  • Constructor Details

    • SpecialCargoHold

      public SpecialCargoHold(int containers, List<TileEdge> edges, String graphicPath)
      Constructs a new Special Cargo Hold with the specified number of containers and edges. The hold is automatically configured to be able to hold special cargo.
      Parameters:
      containers - the number of containers this cargo hold can store
      edges - a List of TileEdge objects representing the four edges of this tile
